title: About The White bus
creator_credit: Lindsay Anderson, John Fletcher, Marlene Fletcher and Dateline Film Productions
brief_description: ‘The White bus’ was a dramatic film directed by Lindsay Anderson about a northern English town. John Fletcher, a friend and colleague of Anderson, has made a film about his friend at work, recording many private moments in the creation of the film; script, production, conferences, location work, editing, dubbing, music laying. An insight into the creative process of film production.
